name: Redapto
long_description:
Redapto fixes the core limitation of today’s agents: they’re static. Teams hit real performance walls because models aren’t optimized for their domain and don’t improve from usage. We help products break that plateau.

We bring continuous improvement into your stack: controller models for intelligent context engineering, domain-specialized mid/post-training, automatic feedback pipelines, and self-updating data sources so RAG/search stays accurate. We focus only on what moves the needle for your product, not extra infrastructure.

We’re applied researchers who’ve shipped this at scale. At Coinbase, our agent automations save $2.5M+ annually; at Adobe and Amazon, our post-training and compression work saved $1M+ and improved latency 20×. We’ve published at NeurIPS, AAAI, ICLR, and COLING, and we’re building Redapto to make adaptive, evolving agents the new default.
